abstract: A post on Mediaite has come in handy in the dispute between the two companies, which began in June.
snippet: A post on Mediaite has come in handy in the dispute between the two companies, which began in June.
lead_paragraph: 5:47 p.m. | Updated Does the snarkiness of a blog post translate for a mainstream, general audience? A cable company is hoping to find out.

headline.main: AMC Ad Uses Snarky Blog Post to Mock Dish Network
